Class QuartoClient

java.lang.Object
client.QuartoClient
public class QuartoClient extends Object
Network client for communicating with the Quarto server. The client runs a dedicated listener thread that processes incoming messages asynchronously.

    • QuartoClient

      public QuartoClient()

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect(String host, int port, QuartoClient.GameListener listener) throws IOException
      Connects to the Quarto server and starts the listener thread.
      Parameters:
      host - server hostname
      port - server port
      listener - UI listener for callbacks
      Throws:
      IOException - if the connection fails

    • rankList

      public void rankList()

    • login

      public void login(String username)
      Sends a LOGIN command to the server.
      Parameters:
      username - chosen username

    • queue

      public void queue()
      Sends a QUEUE command to the server. Places the client into the matchmaking queue.

    • sendMove

      public void sendMove(int location, int nextPiece)
      Sends a MOVE command to the server.
      Parameters:
      location - board index, or -1 if no placement
      nextPiece - next piece id

    • listPlayers

      public void listPlayers()
      Requests a list of currently connected players.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the client connection.
